title: La Abeja
subtitle: The Bee
meta_desc: Learn bee vocabulary in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish insects book, bee Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: La Abeja
pages.prompt: A cute realistic honeybee on a bright yellow sunflower, fuzzy body visible, professional macro photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La abeja hace miel.
pages.prompt: Realistic honeycomb dripping with golden honey, bees working on comb, professional food photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La abeja tiene rayas.
pages.prompt: Close-up of a realistic honeybee showing black and yellow stripes, fuzzy body, professional macro photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La abeja zumba.
pages.prompt: A realistic bee in flight with motion blur on wings, approaching a flower, professional macro photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La abeja visita flores.
pages.prompt: A realistic bee pollinating a field of colorful wildflowers, pollen on legs, professional nature photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La abeja vive en la colmena.
pages.footer: The bee lives in the hive.
pages.prompt: A realistic beehive with bees entering and leaving, warm sunny day, professional nature photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.
